alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 4:37PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pinal County through 515 PM MST... At 436 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mammoth, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mammoth, San Manuel and Dudleyville. This includes Route 77 between mile markers 99 and 128. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Southeast Pinal County including Kearny, Mammoth, Oracle
